name: good time fingerless mitts
notes:
errata:  
round 33 should read: **k11, k1f&b, slm, k1. k11, slm, k1f&b,k1. k12.**

you are replacing "**pm**" with "**slm**"

these mitts are a fantastic, easy, and quick knit.  one of my issues with mittens are that they are usually loose, particularly around the wrist.  i wanted to create a glove that fits snug.  these look small when being knitted, but everyone who has tried them on always say they are super comfy.  they stretch to fit the size of the hand.

one skein will be more than enough to knit a pair.  

this is the perfect take anywhere project.  beginners and seasoned knitters will both enjoy this pattern.  if knit perfectly, people will ask where you bought them.  

try them!  they are addictive and make terrific gifts.
